explains: adj. 粗俗的，庸俗的，不雅的；（笑话、评论、动作等）下流的；（人）粗鲁的，无礼的；平民的，通俗语言的

sentences.en: I think it's a very vulgar house.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是一栋很俗气的房子。

sentences.en: The women laughed coarsely at some vulgar joke.
sentences.cn: 女人们听到某个庸俗笑话后便粗俗地笑了起来。

sentences.en: I think that is the most vulgar and tasteless remark I have ever heard in my life.
sentences.cn: 我认为那是我平生听到过的最庸俗没品位的话。
